author: X6498DSthomas
title: Standard Hotel, a bit pricey, good restaurant
text: Many minor details not in working order, e.g. broken tiles and shaking water taps in the bathroom, broken lamp in the room, iron not clean. However, staff is very friendly and helpful. Breakfast top quality, but expensive (â‚¬26/person). Value for money out of balance, maybe because of the location in the centre of La Defence.
